description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for managing order-related operations, including creating an order, retrieving a list of orders, and fetching details of a specific order. It uses middleware for authentication and interacts with order service functions.

methods.name: router.post
methods.description: Handles creation of a new order for the authenticated user by calling the placeOrder service.

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Retrieves a list of orders for the authenticated user.

methods.name: router.get('/:id')
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific order identified by id for the authenticated user.
